definitions: in a way that expresses approval or agreement

examples.text: they asked him whether he would like the job and he replied affirmatively
two of the six who voted affirmatively last August face re-election this year

shortDefinitions: in way that expresses approval or agreement

definitions: in a deliberate or unequivocal way

examples.text: the burden will now be on the offender to affirmatively prove that release is appropriate
states should affirmatively ban the practice

definitions: in a way that favors individuals belonging to groups known to have been discriminated against previously

examples.text: the idea of acting affirmatively to combat racial and ethnic exclusion is under revision in the nation's highest court

shortDefinitions: in way that favours individuals belonging to groups who have been discriminated against
